stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Ichi 2.0
